description: Baseline P50/tail latencies for EdgeVec benchmark validation suite (W18.3 v1.3.1: CI-calibrated)

hardware.note: Baselines calibrated from actual CI benchmark runs (x86-64-v3 target)
hardware.reference: GitHub Actions ubuntu-latest with x86-64-v3 (AVX2 only, no AVX512)
hardware.warning: Local development (target-cpu=native) may be 1.5-2.2x faster than CI

thresholds.tail_estimation_note: Tail latency estimated as mean + 5*std_dev (conservative bound, ~P99.99997 for normal distributions). This is intentionally more conservative than true P99 to catch regressions early.
thresholds.baseline_methodology: CI-measured values + 20% buffer for CI runner variance
thresholds.note: P50: Fail if >110% baseline. Tail: Fail if >150% baseline or >5x median

insert_1k.description: Insert 1000 vectors (768 dimensions) into HNSW index

search_10k.description: Search k=10 in 10k vector index (768 dimensions)
